text: The Deutsche Mark (DM) was the official currency of West Germany (1948–1990) and Germany (1990–2002) until the adoption of the euro in 2002. One Deutsche Mark was divided into 100 Pfennig. 1DM ~ 0,50 EUR. Category:Former currencies of Europe Category:Economy of Germany Category:1948 establishments in Germany Category:2002 disestablishments in Europe Category:2000s disestablishments in Germany
title: Deutsche Mark
